title: Amazing views, spacious 2 bed / 1 bath, great amenities, 1200 sq ft
posting_body: ['Welcome to Shadow Lake', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1553/Month | 2 Bedroom 1 Bath | 1200 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '● Sunroom', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Extended living room area', '● Fireplace in Select Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '● Views', 'Community Features', '● Business Center', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Central Air', '● Clubhouse', '● Dogs & Cats Welcome', '● Extended living room area', '● Fitness Center', '● Picnic Area with Grill', '● Smoke Free', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Lake on Site', '● Laundry Facilities', '● MARTA Access', '● Pet Care', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Scenic Lake', '● Se Habla Espanol', '● Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '● Wooded Views', 'About Community', 'Description:', "The living spaces at Shadow Lake Apartments are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Doraville, GA.", 'Location:', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '89F83FC5E4B0457']
